about_the_game:
Welcome, Pilots, to the Rogue Aces Deluxe Demo!

It’s time to join the Rogue Aces and liberate the islands from The Baron and his dreaded pilots in this explosive 5 mission demo. Will you be able to face the fiercest of foes with only one life and three planes? Take down waves of dastardly enemies in this endlessly emergent air combat rogue-like where nothing is the same twice.

This demo of Rogue Aces gives you a lovely slice of the full game... 5 random missions including a baron boss fight. And because it's procedurally generated, the missions and terrain will be different every time you play!

.

What's in the demo?


* 5 missions of the campaign mode
* One of the 1-4 player deathmatch party game modes (Pure Deathmatch)

.

This demo of Rogue Aces gives you a lovely slice of the full game... 5 random missions including a baron boss fight. And because it's procedurally generated, the missions and terrain will be different every time you play!

name: Rogue Aces Deluxe Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Rogue Aces Deluxe Demo - s small taste of the definitive aerial combat roguelike. Explosive single player balletic chaos with sophisticated flight controls. Enjoy 5 levels of the campaign plus one of the 1-4 player deathmatch party game modes.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
